description._content: Gottlieb, William P., 1917-, photographer. [Portrait of Charlie Ventura, National studio, New York, N.Y., ca. Oct. 1946] 1 negative : b&w ; 2 1/4 x 2 1/4 in. Notes: Gottlieb Collection Assignment No. 052 Reference print available in Music Division, Library of Congress. Purchase William P. Gottlieb Forms part of: William P.
